title: Washer/Dryers, Controlled Access Entry Building, Fitness Center
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 796 Sq.
Nantucket Apartments offers you a unique living experience unparalleled by any other apartment community.
With beautifully designed landscaped gardens create the feeling of a quiet, intimate neighborhood.
We are located right next door to Lick Mill Park and within walking distance of cycling and jogging trails along the Guadalupe River, and many new shops and restaurants.
With our fitness center, full service business center, billiards parlor, Parcel Pending Lockers, pool side Wi-Fi, car wash area, Nantucket has everything you’re looking for in a home.
ALL Appliances, Non-Smoking, Fireplace*, Washer/Dryers, Renovated Interiors, In unit laundry room*

Fitness Center, Billiards Table, Package Receiving, Dry Cleaning Services, Planned Community Activities, Spa, Car Wash Area, Basketball Court, Gated Community, Swimming Pool, Controlled Access Entry Building, Free Wi-fi in Common Areas, Business Center, Garden Areas
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033
